amber_token.name: Amber API Token
amber_token.description: Get this from Amber → Settings → Developer.

use_ha_entities.name: Use HA Entities (no Amber API)
use_ha_entities.description: If enabled, ignore Amber API token and read forecasts from Home Assistant entities.

ha_export_entity.name: Export (SELL) Entity
ha_export_entity.description: Optional (e.g., sensor.amber_feed_in_forecast). Falls back to import entity's spot_per_kwh if blank.

station_id.name: Sigen Station ID
station_id.description: 15-digit Station ID. In MySigen: ask Sigen AI Assistant "What is my Station ID?"

sigen_pass_enc.name: Sigen Password (Encrypted Blob)
sigen_pass_enc.description: Preferred long-term auth. See Documentation for how to capture this value.

sigen_bearer.name: Sigen Bearer Token
sigen_bearer.description: Short-lived (~12h) token. Works immediately but expires; use pass_enc for stability.

interval.name: Update Interval
interval.description: Only 5 or 30 minutes are supported. Sigen app may ignore 5 min updates currently.

advanced.name: Price Type
advanced.description: Which Amber price band to use: low / predicted / high.

use_current.name: Use Current Prices
use_current.description: Include the current interval’s price in the plan.

dry_run.name: Dry Run
dry_run.description: Fetch and compute but do not update Sigen.

tz_override.name: Timezone Override
tz_override.description: E.g., Australia/Sydney. Leave blank to auto-detect.
